name: Select metrics for device
Setup variables for template
Metric validation
Update metric query
template:
UPDATE metrics
SET slave_id=:slave_id, function_code=:function_code,
    register_start=:register_start, data_format=:data_format,
    byte_order=:byte_order, refresh_rate=:refresh_rate,
    name=:name
WHERE id=:id

name: Insert metric query
template:
INSERT INTO metrics (device_id, slave_id, function_code, register_start, data_format, byte_order, refresh_rate, name)
VALUES (:device_id, :slave_id, :function_code, :register_start, :data_format, :byte_order, :refresh_rate, :name);

Select metrics data query
template:
SELECT * 
FROM metrics_data 
WHERE metric_id = :id
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 50;
